nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to bank support! How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: identify_issue
utterances: What issue are you experiencing with your account?

nodes.label: password_reset
utterances: To reset your password, do you have access to your registered email?

nodes.label: email_confirmation
utterances: Great! I've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check it.

nodes.label: issue_resolved
utterances: I'm glad to hear that! Is there anything else you need help with?

messages.text: Welcome to bank support! How can I assist you today?
Hi, I need help with my bank account
What issue are you experiencing with your account?
I forgot my password
To reset your password, do you have access to your registered email?
Yes, I have access to my email
Great! I've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check it.
Thank you, I've reset my password
I'm glad to hear that! Is there anything else you need help with?
I need help with another issue
Thank you for contacting bank support! How can I help you today?
Hello, I need assistance with my bank account.
Could you please tell me what problem you're facing with your account?
I've forgotten my password.
Do you have access to the email address linked to your account for a password reset?
Yes, I can access my email.
Perfect! I've just sent you a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
Thanks! I've successfully changed my password.
That's wonderful news! Is there anything else I can assist you with?
I have another issue that I need help with.
Thank you for contacting bank support! How can I help you today?
Hello, I require assistance with my bank account.
Could you please tell me what problem you're facing with your account?
I've forgotten my password.
Do you have access to the email address linked to your account for the password reset?
Yes, I can access my email.
Awesome! I've just sent a link to reset your password to your email. Please take a look.
Thanks, I've successfully reset my password.
That's great to hear! Is there anything else I can assist you with?
I have another issue I need help with.

What specific features are you hoping to find in your upgraded plan?
I need a plan with more data.

Hello! How can I help you with your mobile plan today?
Hi there, I'm looking to upgrade my mobile plan.
What specific features are you hoping to get with your upgrade?
I really need a plan with more data.
We do have an upgraded plan that offers increased data. Would that work for you?
Yes, that sounds perfect!

Of course, here’s my payment information.

Yes, I'd love to look at more options!
